alert.note: Alert for Foard; Hardeman; Knox; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 04 at 6:56PM CDT until April 04 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Extreme fire weather conditions expected Tuesday evening... .Very warm and dry conditions will support rapid fire spread especially across portions of western and northwestern Oklahoma. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 004, 005, 006, 007, 009, 010, 011, 012, 014, 015, 016, 017, 018, 021, 022, 033, 034, 035, 036, 037, 083, 084, 085, AND 087... * TIMING...Tuesday evening. * WINDS...Southwest 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 4 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Upper mid 70s to mid 80s. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop could spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is discouraged.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures will contribute to extreme fire behavior.
